=====================================
Roadmap & NumAaron Enhancement Proposals
=====================================

This page provides an overview of development priorities for NumAaron.
Specifically, it contains a roadmap with a higher-level overview, as
well as NumAaron Enhancement Proposals (NEPs)—suggested changes
to the library—in various stages of discussion or completion (see `NEP
0 <nep-0000>`__).
